title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
Whisk the eggs and cheese together in a bowl.
Combine spaghetti, bacon, and egg mixture off the heat.
Season with salt and pepper and serve.
